name: CongenitalCytomegalovirusTestsForCMVByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Congenital Cytomegalovirus (Tests for CMV by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Cytomegalovirus by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Cytomegalovirus),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
